text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Vaccines for Covid19 is like asking for a drug against scurvy when all you need is Vitamin C.

HCQ is 40+ years old, effective against malaria still today, and ingested as Quinine in a Gin and Tonic to afford resistance to a myriad of diseases, viruses

Why vaccines?
Pharma want$
